name: Super Bio Boy
description: The scientist who went with his head was so carried away by the cartoon "Monsters Corporation". that he decided to make his own Mike Wazowski. Naturally, the creature did not turn out to be an exact copy of Mike, but inherited the main features of the famous ponstra. One day, a scientist loses his pet and you have to go through a difficult path, playing as a green monster, in order to return back to your master.
